content.c_venueAddress: The Hippodrome Casino, Leicester Square, London, WC2H 7JH
content.name: Magic Mike Live

primaryPhoto.description:
Magic Mike London Tickets
Created by Channing Tatum, MAGIC MIKE LIVE is an unforgettable night of sizzling, 360-degree entertainment based on the hit films. It’s fun. It’s hot. It’s the great time you’ve been waiting for!
Celebrating five years at London’s Hippodrome Casino in it’s luxurious custom-built Theatre, MAGIC MIKE LIVE has already welcomed over 425,000 audience members. It’s the show with someone for everyone. Pick your favourite from an irresistible cast of handsome and talented guys as they perform heart-racing dance routines in front of, above and all around you. Equal parts empowering and exhilarating, the international hit which is also playing in Las Vegas and on tour in the US, is punctuated by unexpected, temperature-raising acts from a thrilling range of acrobatic and musical talent. In other words, it’s more than you expect.. and everything you want.
If you’re looking for the ultimate girls’ night out or an electrifying date night, look no further than MAGIC MIKE LIVE. If you’re NOT into letting your hair down, laughing out loud and really hot guys, then it’s probably not for you.
Get ready to MEET YOUR WILD SIDE and book your MAGIC MIKE LIVE tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
